LPC10 encoding and decoding

What does it do?

The LPC10 module implements the US Department of Defense LPC10 codec. This codec produces compressed data at 2400bps. At such a low rate high fidelity cannot be expected. However, the speech clarity is quite good, and this codec is unencumbered by patent or other restrictions.
